_header: Philosophers and clerks of planets all
_description: On the position and courses of the planets; an extract from the Pricke of Conscience — forty-seven lines in couplets

CamTCC1144.First Lines:
Phylysores & clarkes of planetis allBy certyn skylle hevens
                    they callThe fyrst þe mone & marcury & then venus&
                    þen þe son & mars & than Iupiter…
CamTCC1144.Last Lines:
…But þe planettes be not lade sofor in here circul abowte
                    thay go
CamTCC1144.Editions:
Mooney,  Linne R. 
             “Practical Didactic Works in Middle English.” 
         Diss. Toronto, 1981: 215-18.
